EmailTemplate.subject: Save the Date! ASA Training Event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Save the date for a workshop that helps refine your skills and keeps you informed.
National FFELP guarantor American Student Assistance® has designed a half day event to discuss some of the key concerns of financial aid administrators. Two of our most requested topics will be covered.
Let’s Talk Loans In this session we’ll go over some changes affecting loan certifications, answer any loan questions you may have, and finish off with case studies to hone your loan certification skills.
So Much To Do – So Little Time In this session we’ll examine some simple tricks to help you manage your tasks within the time that you have.
For more information please contact: Kelley Bauman Regional Account Executive American Student Assistance 800-999-9080 Ext. 6248 kbauman@amsa.com www.amsa.com
August 21, 2007
We are offering two courses in our half day workshop. Please join us!
8:30am - 12:00pm Continental breakfast and lunch will be provided
